title: Rp cards problem
body: I recently bought 8 rp cards (ik im greedy) and I got 6 of them redeemed then this message shows up " You have exceeded the maximum number of code redemption attempts at this time. Please wait and try again later" and today I tried it again after 12 hours. DO i need to wait another 24 hour or just 12 hours?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing an issue redeeming your prepaid RP cards?
